name: Couatl
description: The Couatl is a celestial serpent adorned with colorful, feathered wings and shimmering iridescent scales.
memorable: The Couatl's unique abilities to shapeshift and cast powerful spells while maintaining a protective nature make it stand out.
goals: Guarding sacred places and protecting good-aligned individuals from evil forces.
relations: Often acts as a guide or ally to adventurers and good-aligned creatures.
environment: Sacred locations, often found protecting important individuals or areas.
strengths: Excellent spellcasting capabilities, strong resistances, and the ability to heal and protect allies.
weaknesses: Can be overwhelmed if caught by surprise or outmatched by coordinated attacks.
attacks: Utilizes a potent bite attack that can induce a poison effect and a constrict move that grapples enemies.
most_powerful_ability: Can heal allies and remove poison or disease with a magical touch, demonstrating its support role.
senses: Possesses truesight up to 120 feet, allowing it to see the invisible and discern true forms.
skills: Highly skilled in perception and religion, with good proficiency in persuasion.
additional_information: Resistant to radiant damage and nonmagical physical damage.
Magic resistance grants advantage on saves against spells.
Innate spellcasting allows versatile utility without material components.
Can change shape into a humanoid or beast for versatility.
Has the Shielding Wing ability to protect allies from attacks.
spellcasting: Innate spellcasting based on Charisma, allowing it to cast spells like detect magic and heal allies.
test_queries: serpent with healing abilities and radiant resistance
creature with truesight defending sacred places
